code: import Swal from"sweetalert2";import{UpdateStatusRequest}from"../../../API/APIRequest";export function UpdateAleart(id,status){return Swal.fire({title:'Change Status',input:'select',inputOptions:{New:"New",Completed:"Completed",Progress:"Progress",Canceled:"Canceled"},inputValue:status}).then(function(result){return UpdateStatusRequest(id,result.value).then(function(res){return res;});});}
